info.name: Firms API
info.description:
# Firm API Documentation

Base URL:

```
/api/firms
```

---

# Firm Fields

```ts
name: string
logo?: Media                // send as numeric ID
cover_photo?: Media         // send as numeric ID
practice_areas?: BlocksListItem[]
bio?: string
website_url?: string
linkedin_url?: string
firm_size?: number
total_revenue?: string
profit_per_partner?: string
revenue_per_lawyer?: string
partnership_structure?: string
avg_partner_salary?: string
awards?: string
associates?: number
partners?: number
counsels?: number
headquarters?: FirmHeadquarters
lawyers?: Lawyer[]
offices?: OfficeLocation[]
deals?: Deal[]
law_group?: Magic Circle / Silver Circle / Wall Street / ...
news?: News[]
source_url?: string
enrichedId: string
```

---

# Endpoints

## Get All Firms

```
GET /api/firms
```

### Query Options

| Feature         | Example                                       |
| --------------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| Populate all    | `?populate=*`                                 |
| Populate fields | `?populate=lawyers,offices,deals`             |
| Nested populate | `?populate[lawyers][populate]=deals`          |
| Filter          | `?filters[name][$containsi]=baker`            |
| Pagination      | `?pagination[page]=1&pagination[pageSize]=20` |
| Sorting         | `?sort=name:asc`                              |

---

# Populate Examples

### All relations

```
GET /api/firms?populate=*
```

### Nested

```
GET /api/firms?populate[lawyers][populate]=career
```

```
GET /api/firms?populate[offices][populate]=city
```

```
GET /api/firms?populate[deals][populate]=law_firms
```

---

# Filter Examples

```
GET /api/firms?filters[law_group][$eq]=Magic%20Circle
```

```
GET /api/firms?filters[name][$containsi]=mckenzie
```

```
GET /api/firms?filters[partners][$gte]=100
```

```
GET /api/firms?filters[offices][documentId][$eq]=office-123
```

---

# Create Firm

(Strapi Document Mode â€” relations use **documentId**, media uses **ID**)

```
POST /api/firms
```

```json
{
  "data": {
    "name": "Baker & Finch LLP",
    "firm_size": 2200,
    "law_group": "Magic Circle",

    "logo": 12,
    "cover_photo": 33,
    "lawyers": {
      "connect": [
        { "documentId": "lawyer-100" },
        { "documentId": "lawyer-220" }
      ]
    },

    "offices": {
      "connect": [
        { "documentId": "office-001" },
        { "documentId": "office-002" }
      ]
    },

    "deals": {
      "connect": [
        { "documentId": "deal-009" }
      ]
    },

    "news": {
      "connect": [
        { "documentId": "news-555" }
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

---

# Update Firm

```
PUT /api/firms/:documentId
```

### Example: Update Media + Swap Lawyers

```json
{
  "data": {
    "cover_photo": 44,

    "lawyers": {
      "set": [
        { "documentId": "lawyer-new-01" },
        { "documentId": "lawyer-new-02" }
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

---

# Disconnect Examples

## Disconnect Multiple (many-to-many)

### Remove some lawyers

```json
{
  "data": {
    "lawyers": {
      "disconnect": [
        { "documentId": "lawyer-100" },
        { "documentId": "lawyer-220" }
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

### Remove all offices

```json
{
  "data": {
    "offices": {
      "set": []
    }
  }
}
```

---

# Delete Firm

```
DELETE /api/firms/:documentId
```

---

# Complete Query Example

```
GET /api/firms
  ?populate[lawyers][populate]=deals
  &populate[offices]=*
  &filters[law_group][$eq]=Magic%20Circle
  &filters[partners][$gte]=100
  &sort=name:asc
  &pagination[page]=1
  &pagination[pageSize]=10
```
